VEC.Q: How many ridgelines are in this ridgeline chart?
VEC.A: There are {6} slices in this chart.

SRP.Q: What is the spatial relationship of the peak of Elective Procedures relative to the peak of Preventive Care in terms of vertical (above/below) and horizontal (left/right) directions?
SRP.A: The peak of  Elective Procedures is to the {right} of the peak of Preventive Care.

VPR.Q: What distribution pattern does the ridgeline representing Chronic Disease Management show?
VPR.A: The ridgeline representing Chronic Disease Management shows a {Periodic fluctuation}.

EVJ.Q: Which ridgeline has the highest peak
EVJ.A: The ridgeline representing {Pediatric Care} has the highest peak.

EVJ.Q: Which label has the highest density at X =853.5?
EVJ.A: At X =853.5,the label with the highest density is {Pediatric Care}

NF.Q: Which countries in the ridgeline chart have ridgeline peaks exceed 4031? Please list the countries and corresponding peak values.
NF.A: {Chronic Disease Management}'s peak at {8579},{Surgical Treatments}'s peak at {8148}

NF.Q: Which countries in the ridgeline chart have ridgeline peaks below 3657? Please list the countries and corresponding peak values.
NF.A: {Elective Procedures}'s peak at {3163},{Preventive Care}'s peak at {2132},{Pediatric Care}'s peak at {921},{Mental Health}'s peak at {991}

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Mental Health or Chronic Disease Management?
NC.A: {Chronic Disease Management} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Surgical Treatments or Elective Procedures?
NC.A: {Surgical Treatments} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Preventive Care or Pediatric Care?
NC.A: {Preventive Care} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

MSR.Q: How many ridges have their peak located to the right of the average X value across all ridges?
MSR.A: There are {2} ridges whose peaks are located to the right of the average X value.

MSR.Q: What is the label of the ridge with the largest span along the mountain height?
MSR.A: The ridge with the largest span in the mountain height is {Pediatric Care}
